body:
Hello, technically I joined Avicore with my alt first in November, but on this account I joined on December 25, 2013 at 5:47am, so I couldn't wait to do the AMA then, so I did it now xD. I have aboarded the AMA, train.

Ask away.

replies.body: Opinions as a person, map maker and pvper?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions as a person, map maker and pvper?

replies.body:
1) You're getting better as I can tell.
2) When you first got Mentor, you seemed to be a little controlling, and I didn't like that at first. However, when I started to observe that all you were trying to do was improve the Staff and I appreciate that.
3) I kinda started to talk to you to more and you are a really cool person and fun to be around with.
Favorite:
Shadowolf
Cammy
I have 3, but from those 3, PieZ, because he's been helping me a lot lately.
Crazy_
dev_revs
_DISTRACTION_
Fouled
Posighdun
Proddy
Abusive
DoctaPop
Athena
Edit: I forgot to do demote/promote people:
I would promote:
PieZ -> Admin
iAbusing -> Mod
Cammy -> Senior
I would demote: 
_Menance -> User
nitendoboy11 -> User
Oscar -> User

replies.body: You are really cool and a fun person to talk to, I'm so glad I let you be leader of Emoji, because we wouldn't be as close as we are todag. Sometimes we are an asshole to each other looooool xd. Your maps are great. You're bad, jk you're pretty good.

replies.body: Great friend, known you for a quite awhile now. So weird how we met, because of a cake design for a cape xD. Thanks for staying up late to talk to me and those times when I stayed up late to talk to you lol.
replies.body_tagged: Great friend, known you for a quite awhile now. So weird how we met, because of a cake design for a cape xD. Thanks for staying up late to talk to me and those times when I stayed up late to talk to you lol.

replies.body: Sometimes you make me cringe and you get triggered very easily, hence why I like to joke around with you so much ;). Overall, you're a great friend, cool person to joke around with ^, but sometimes can be arrogant and I don't like that :v.
replies.body_tagged: Sometimes you make me cringe and you get triggered very easily, hence why I like to joke around with you so much ;). Overall, you're a great friend, cool person to joke around with ^, but sometimes can be arrogant and I don't like that :v.

replies.body: I'm happy that you became a staff member and that you were the right decision *wink*. We didn't really get to know each other until a couple weeks before your trial. How weird that we have the same last name 0.0. You're also a good friend.

I only have known you for a couple of months, but you are nice and cool to hang around with. Happy belated birthday btw.

HOME

Me as Mod

Me as Mod

replies.body:
You express your opinions greatly, but you do it an extent where you argue when someone disagrees with you. You're a good Mod and I still remember a couple of days before I started my trial, you would be talking with me.

You used to be really good, but then you got crap, so you were an eZ fight, but now you're starting to get better again c:.

You are a really nice person and we've spent time on Snapchat bantering. We would sometimes express what we felt about the outside world and Avicus, and making plans on what to do about it :33.

replies.body:
I don't understand why you took your demotion immaturely and started to bash staff members and sabotage some of us. It was your own fault, not ours. When you were Moderator, I don't know what you did as a Mod, other then getting yourself demoted, so I can't form an opinion from there. I guess you are trying to get a second chance and change from what you did and I wish you good luck. We did have some conversations here and there, and they were great :P.

Anyone can be a good Admin, so sure.

No, I don't love him either before you say I do.

Not a good rapper.

Not up to me to unban you.

Something that makes a lot of $$.
